channel.title: Problem
channel.description: hi im h4rder 0wnage and i have a problem with my moparscape when i log in. after 10 seconds the connection is lost and i cant log in any more what to do?

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @Schedin Schedin
item.description:
@Schedin wrote:

just make sure when you do it, that you dont get the invalad id name. if you just started the char it would prob just be best to start over. also if you want an ID search at the top of the moparscape client under the help tab click ITEM ID a list should pop up with a search bar. cheers =)

Read full topic

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Schedin is right.

Before you delete your Character, copy and paste everything in its Character file, delete the file. Log in on your account again, log out (So that your file appears in your Characters Folder) Then paste everything from your old Char File into the new one

Read full topic

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @Schedin Schedin
item.description:
@Schedin wrote:

i had this problem when i first started… my problem was i tried to spawn a firecape and the version of mopar that i was using didnt support fire capes so when i picked it up and tried to wield it i got DCted and i couldnt get back in. if this is your case, do this…

moparscape folder>hybridscape>characters>delete your main char

Read full topic

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @J0Y J0Y
item.description:
@J0Y wrote:

What error does it say under “MoparScape”
In the black bit. ( If theres one )

If not, Just click Start server again, Or Close and open cilent.

Read full topic
